title: Tennessee Arrives at No. 1; Vibrant Available Field; MACtion Over the World Series; Future of the West
description:
Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss Tennessee at No. 1 in the first College Football Playoff ranking, if an SEC champion could miss the playoff, when Rece first sees the rankings, Pete’s Tuesday night watching MACtion, Illinois’ path to the playoff, how the Volunteers will line up against Brock Bowers, a vote of confidence in Tennessee’s offense against Georgia defense from coaches around the sport, if they’re just picking at Georgia’s flaws and a huge test for Jayden Daniels against Alabama’s defense.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Rece Davis, Pete Thamel
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Rece Davis and Pete Thamel discuss the first batch of CFP rankings, how Tennessee defends Brock Bowers and a big spot for LSU with Alabama in town
